emoji 0.2.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

List all emoji with a given keyword

Source: R/emoji.R
emoji_find.Rd

This function will look in emoji_keyword to report back the given emojis.

emoji_find(keyword)

Arguments

keyword

Character, Emoji keyword.

Examples

emoji_find("happy")
#> # A tibble: 5 Ã— 2
#>   name         emoji
#>   <chr>        <chr>

#> 5 raising_hand ğŸ™‹
